Class PizzaOrder

java.lang.Object
PizzaOrder
public class PizzaOrder extends Object
Class representing an order of pizza to make.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) static final String[]
    AVAILABLE_TOPPINGS
    The toppings that are available to put on a pizza.
    (package private) String
    crust
    The type of crust for the pizza.
    (package private) String
    customerName
    The name of the customer for the order.
    (package private) static final double
    DISCOUNT
    The amount to deduct from the subtotal when the order is discounted.
    (package private) boolean
    discounted
    Whether or not the order is discounted.
    (package private) static final String[]
    OWNERS
    The names of the owners.
    (package private) int
    pizzaSize
    The size of the pizza to be made.
    (package private) double
    subtotal
    The subtotal of the order.
    (package private) static final double
    TAX_RATE
    The sales tax rate to apply to the order.
    (package private) static final double
    TOPPING_CHARGE
    The charge for each topping, besides cheese.
    (package private) ArrayList<String>
    toppings
    An array representing the toppings to put on the pizza.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PizzaOrder()
    Creates a new instance of a PizzaOrder object and adds Cheese as a topping.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handleCrustChoice()
    Prompts the user for their choice of pizza crust and sets the crust type on their order.
    void
    handlePizzaSize()
    Prompts the user for their choice of pizza size and adds the corresponding price to the subtotal.
    void
    handleToppingChoice(String topping)
    Prompts the user to ask if they want the specified topping.
    static boolean
    hasOwnersName(String name)
    Checks whether a specified name matches that of one of the owners.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Executes the pizza ordering program, creating a new PizzaOrder object and setting the necessary attributes.
    static void
    printMenu()
    Prints the menu for the user to see.
    void
    printSummary()
    Calculates the subtotal, tax, and total cost of the order and prints a summary of the order for the user, then tells them when it will be ready.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PizzaOrder

      public PizzaOrder()
      Creates a new instance of a PizzaOrder object and adds Cheese as a topping.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Executes the pizza ordering program, creating a new PizzaOrder object and setting the necessary attributes.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments.

    • handleCrustChoice

      public void handleCrustChoice()
      Prompts the user for their choice of pizza crust and sets the crust type on their order.

    • handlePizzaSize

      public void handlePizzaSize()
      Prompts the user for their choice of pizza size and adds the corresponding price to the subtotal.

    • handleToppingChoice

      public void handleToppingChoice(String topping)
      Prompts the user to ask if they want the specified topping. If they do, it is added to the order's toppings array and the TOPPING_CHARGE is added to the subtotal.
      Parameters:
      topping - the topping to ask the customer if they want

    • hasOwnersName

      public static boolean hasOwnersName(String name)
      Checks whether a specified name matches that of one of the owners.
      Parameters:
      name - name to check if it matches one of the owners
      Returns:
      true if the name matches one of the owners, false otherwise.

    • printMenu

      public static void printMenu()
      Prints the menu for the user to see.

    • printSummary

      public void printSummary()
      Calculates the subtotal, tax, and total cost of the order and prints a summary of the order for the user, then tells them when it will be ready.
